column2: "Senpai, this request is about a Dragonkin from the Skyscape called Baridran. It's a beast-like dragon."

"Doesn't sound like much of a threat, huh? Well, maybe it isn't...
But even so, I'm struggling with it."
"Before I can even get near them, they swarm and bombard me from long range. I have no idea how to defeat them efficiently."
"I hate having to keep coming to you, senpai, but could you show me how to beat one with a Just Attack?"
